Configuration Models

Configuration data models and validation for GeminiSDR system.

This module defines the configuration data structures using dataclasses with proper typing and validation logic.

class geminisdr.config.config_models.DeviceType(*values)[source]

Bases: Enum

Supported device types for computation.

AUTO = 'auto'
CPU = 'cpu'
MPS = 'mps'
CUDA = 'cuda'

geminisdr.config.config_models.validate_config(config: SystemConfig) → List[str][source]

Validate a complete system configuration and return list of validation errors.

Parameters:

config – SystemConfig instance to validate

Returns:

List of validation error messages (empty if valid)

geminisdr.config.config_models.create_default_config(environment: str = 'development') → SystemConfig[source]

Create a default system configuration for the specified environment.

Parameters:

environment – Target environment (development, testing, production)

Returns:

SystemConfig with environment-appropriate defaults
